name: Little man (whataboutme42)
description:
this is a simple game about collecting all the coins as fast as possible.

WASD to move 

Mouse to look

Esc to open options

this game was cobbled together and I haven't slept in so long! I am aware of the following problems including but not limited to...

  • Player movement is very odd
    • player sticks to walls when pushing against them
  • game may potentially be too laggy on some devices
  • no sound
  • the gameplay has nothing to do with the theme
  • UI sometimes  distorts and becomes unusable
